src:
"La protesta contra el rei agita la campanya", portada de l'ARA

04 Nov 2019, 22:12

La polèmica visita de Felip VI a Barcelona dona forma al tema destacat de l'ARA d'aquest dimarts. "La protesta contra el rei agita la campanya" és el titular de la principal de la portada, en la qual també es destaquen aquests temes:

"Sánchez proposa tornar a convertir en delicte els referèndums unilaterals"
"Totes les escoles hauran de ser inclusives"
"Iberia compra Air Europa per 1.000 milions"
"Menys delictes però més violents a Barcelona"
text:
"The protest against the king waves the campaign", led by the ARA

04 Nov 2019, 22:12

Philip VI's controversial visit to Barcelona gives shape to the highlight of the ARA this Tuesday. "The protest against the king waves the campaign" is the headline of the main cover, which also highlights these issues:

"Sánchez proposes to turn the unilateral referendums into a crime"
"All schools must be inclusive"
"Iberia buys Air Europa for 1,000 million"
"Less crimes but more violent in Barcelona"
